amendment.description: Amendment sought to add a new section regarding treatment of bonuses for finacial sector employees.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section regarding treatment of bonuses for finacial sector employees.

action.text: Mrs. Biggert raised a point of order against the Garamendi amendment (A010). Mrs. Biggert stated that the amendment was not germane and violated clause 7 of rule 16. The Chair sustained the point of order.
